name: Moon's Haunted
description:
Description

The game is set on the moon. The main character is an astronaut that stumbles upon an alien base during a moon expedition.

Moon’s Haunted is a 2D retro first-person shooter. The objective is to clear the base and escape. There is a limited amount of ammunition so the player has to be careful with the enemies. The player should also be more focused on stealth.

Controls

Movement - WASD

Shoot - Left mouse click

Pause - Esc

Team Credits
  • Carolina Caeiro (Game Designer)
  • João Cavaco (Game Artist)
  • Miguel Simões (Game Developer)
Install instructions

Files on .ZIP format, extract before playing.

Help us improve

After playing please fill the form bellow.
